articles.id: articles/What No One Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025
articles.title: What No One Tells You About Starting a Website in 2025
articles.description: Everyone says starting a website in 2025 is easier than ever. That’s true—on the surface. But here's what no one really tells you: the deeper challenges, mindset shifts, and hidden work behind every successful site.
articles.author: Alex Canvy
